questions.question: You attended an event. Write an article for your blog.

answers.answer: This sunday afternoon I will organise a party in my garden. The weather should be nice, so coming! You just have to bring your personal drink, I will cook for you. Everybody like hot-dog? I think it's the more simple.
If you want, you can invite your friends but please ask me before.
My parents won't be at home, don't worry.
The swimmingpool will be open, so don't forget to bring your stuffs to go in.
You can come at 12a.m and the party will finish at 03p.m
I hope to see you all.
